mapper.select: select f.fid, f.fstore_name, f.ftitle, f.fdate, f.memail, ct.ctname, t.tname from competition c inner join the_hyundai t on (c.tid = t.tid) inner join funding f on (f.cid = c.cid and f.tid = c.tid) inner join category ct on (ct.ctid = f.ctid) where sysdate between c.cfunding_start_date and c.cfunding_end_date and f.fstatus = 'PARTICIPATE' order by f.fdate
